page.title: 11The caravan site
page.content: Lying to the South-East of the village,between the A96 and the burn the {CARAVAN SITE}has a most attractve peaceful setting in the midst of the local forest. Children can roam safely through extensive woodlands or make use of the more formal facilities such as the on site swings and slide or swimming pool and games hall. For the more restive tourist the caravan site is the perfect base from which to tour the{North of Scotland being midway between{Aberdeen}and {Inverness,}and only a few hours from the mystic{West coast. Nearer at hand are the many golf courses and beaches of the{Moray Firth coast as well as{Spey-side,}the home of the Scotch Whisky industry, where many distilleries welcome visitors.
